description: Number of numbers == 0 (mod 3) in range 2^n to 2^(n+1) with odd number of 1's in binary expansion.
comments: The first numbers with this property are 21, 42, 69, 81, 84, 87, 93,  and 117. - _T. D. Noe_, Jun 20 2012
links: T. D. Noe, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..501
mathematica: nn = 35; CoefficientList[Series[x^3/((1 + x) (1 - 2 x) (1 - 3 x^2)), {x, 0, nn}], x] (* _T. D. Noe_, Jun 20 2012 *)
author: _Russ Cox_
